channel.title: Quickscape/VPS Hosted 24/7 Start Ur Adventure Today!
channel.description:
Website:[url=http://quickscape667.weebly.com/]http://quickscape667.weebly.com/[/url] Play Now:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/87foqw63631ccm3/QuickScape.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/87foqw63631ccm3/QuickScape.jar[/url] Downoable Client:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/87foqw63631ccm3/QuickScape.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/87foqw63631ccm3/QuickScape.jar[/url]
Features: VPS Hosted /24/6 Staff Slots open OWNER : HYPERIO Pvm: -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad (Drops havnt been added) -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen
PvP: -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking
Skilling: -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed
Donatorzone: -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items
Other information: -Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators) -Shops replace GE due to the GE bug. But Ge is still in game if wanted. -Home is Mos Le Harmless. -Few Custom Items -Prestige system (sorted shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands -Dicing (donator+ for rank)
-Still Bieng Fix
-Vote System -VPS -Forums -Searching For active staff & Members
StaffSlots Open -Owner> Hyperion
Home
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/15guhdl.jpg[/img]
(still in developing start ur adventure today !) Be nice with me anti hater!! :palm: ;D :P ;) :D :D :mad: :mad:
